ow.directory
クラス DirectoryProvider

java.lang.Object
  ow.directory.DirectoryProvider
直系の既知のサブクラス:
BerkeleyDBProvider, PersistentMapProvider, VolatileMapProvider
public abstract class DirectoryProvider
extends java.lang.Object

The interface which a directory provider for various backend databases implements.
